page.title: 01WELCOME TO ABERAERON
page.content: {WELCOME TO ABERAERON! {CROESO I ABERAERON! {____________________ Aberaeron is the centre of a community with strong farming and seagoing traditions. It is situated on Cardigan Bay in the county of Dyfed. Pupils and staff of Aberaeron Comprehensive School have compiled the contents of the following pages.We included a brief outline of key events in the history of our town and our School.We have also tried to paint a picture of our lives and the area in which we are fortunate to live. Mae disgyblion ac athrawon Ysgol Gyfun Aberaeron yn gobeithio y byddwch yn mwynhau darlen am fywyd bob dydd y trigolion a'r ardal. The pupils and staff of Aberaeron Comprehensive School hope you enjoy reading about our lives and our town.
